title: Seven bombshells from the SECâ€™s Coinbase suit
description:
On June 6, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filed charges against Coinbase, alleging that the company violated securities regulations. These are the most notable takeaways from those charges. 1. Coinbase operated as an unregistered broker The SEC said that Coinbase’s main trading platform has operated as an unregistered broker, exchange, and clearing agency […]

The post Seven bombshells from the SEC’s Coinbase suit appeared first on CryptoSlate.
